Uses of Class
Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.DepthStencilState

  • Packages that use DepthStencilState 
    Package Description
    Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics  

    • Uses of DepthStencilState in Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics

      Fields in Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics declared as DepthStencilState 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static DepthStencilState DepthStencilState.Default
      A built-in state object with default settings for using a depth stencil buffer.
      static DepthStencilState DepthStencilState.DepthRead
      A built-in state object with settings for enabling a read-only depth stencil buffer.
      static DepthStencilState DepthStencilState.None
      A built-in state object with settings for not using a depth stencil buffer.
      Methods in Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics with parameters of type DepthStencilState 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void SpriteBatch.Begin(SpriteSortMode sortMode, BlendState blendState, SamplerState samplerState, DepthStencilState depthStencilState, RasterizerState rasterizerState)
      Begins a sprite batch operation using the specified sort, blend, sampler, depth stencil and rasterizer state objects.
      void SpriteBatch.Begin(SpriteSortMode sortMode, BlendState blendState, SamplerState samplerState, DepthStencilState depthStencilState, RasterizerState rasterizerState, Effect effect)
      Begins a sprite batch operation using the specified sort, blend, sampler, depth stencil and rasterizer state objects, plus a custom effect.
      void SpriteBatch.Begin(SpriteSortMode sortMode, BlendState blendState, SamplerState samplerState, DepthStencilState depthStencilState, RasterizerState rasterizerState, Effect effect, Matrix transformMatrix)
      Begins a sprite batch operation using the specified sort, blend, sampler, depth stencil, rasterizer state objects, plus a custom effect and a 2D transformation matrix.
